titleStmt.title: By the King a proclamation for the better ordering of those who repayre to the court, for their cure of the disease called the kings euill.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1625-1649 : Charles I)
Charles I, King of England, 1600-1649.

publicationStmt.publisher: By Bonham Norton and Iohn Bill, Printers to the Kings most Excellent Maiestie,

notesStmt.note: "Giuen at His Maiesties Court at White-Hall, the eighteenth day of Iune, in the second yeere of His Maiesties Reigne of Great Britaine, France and Ireland."
Reproduction of original in: Society of Antiquaries.
